xwikidoc.title: NPCs
xwikidoc.content:
= Non Player Characters =
* [[Prodigal Jack>>doc:ProdigalJack]] - The last inhabitant of [[Wild Wood Manor>>doc:WildWoodManor]]. * [[Akoth-Magog>>AkothMagog]] - Leader of the hobgoblin tribes of the [[Hobgoblin Hills>>HobgoblinHills]]. * [[Nomog-Gea>>NomogGea]] - Rival to Akoth-Magog. * [[Carholtha>>DragonCarholtha]] - A powerful adult white dragon living in the [[Alcon Pass>>AlconPass]]. * [[Amaranth>>DragonAmaranth]] - The Great Silver Dragon of Dalcaroth. * [[Turatha>>DragonTuratha]] - The green dragon which lurks in the northen [[Forest of Grin>>ForestOfGrin]]. * [[Summer Twilight>>SummerTwilight]] - A priest of Yilliki. Leader of the moderate faction in Kinergh. * [[Berzerkond>>KondTheBerzerk]] - The current ruler of the [[County of Morkend>>CountyOfMorkend]]. * [[Emoth Eguagnol>>EmothEguagnol]] - The true ruler of the DuchyOfHar. An ancient vampire lord who rules his domain from the shadows. * [[Duke Sharn Kellion II>>SharnKellionII]] - The Duke of the [[Grand Duchy of Tisloch>>Player.GrandDuchyOfTisloch]]. * [[Sir Halden Marsh>>HaldenMarsh]] - The Marshal of Tisloch. He is in charge of the army of the [[Grand Duchy of Tisloch>>Player.GrandDuchyOfTisloch]]. * [[Barand Of Fortunato>>BarandOfFortunato]] - Pretender to the throne of [[The Kingdom of Gilduin>>Main.ErithnoiGilduin]]. * [[Talia>>WizardessTalia]] - The daughter of a famous magician, [[Zorb of Orb>>ZorbOfOrb]]. Talia lives in a tower within Tisloch, which is now the secret headquarters of [[The Silver Company>>SilverCompany]]. She is also a member of the [[Order of Traveling Magi>>OrderOfTravelingMagi]]. * [[Murthond>>RangerMurthond]] - A [[Ranger of Otillis>>RangerOfOtillis]] and also involved in the organization of The [[Silver Company>>SilverCompany]]. His brothers are Chilthond and Silthond, also rangers of Otillis. * [[The King of the Sewers>>KingOfTheSewers]] - The leader of the wererats living in the sewers under Tisloch ** [[Shlek Gnarl>>ShlekGnarl]] - A wererat Priest of Jerok who serves The King of the Sewers * [[Baranax>>SteelDragonBaranax]] - A Steel Dragon who makes his lair secretly in Tisloch. * [[Raxitar>>BlackDragonRaxitar]] - A Black Dragon who lairs in the Relch Bog within the [[Forest of Grin>>ForestOfGrin]]. * [[Silthond>>RangerSilthond]] - A Ranger of Otillis assigned to the lodge near Vim. Brother of Murthond and Chilthond. * [[The Green Adept>>GreenAdept]] - A powerful evil mage thought to have been recently destroyed. * [[Draelek Turoth>>DraelekTuroth]] - The Warden of [[Suri Natha>>SuriNatha]]. * [[Galar Nut>>GalarNut]] - The Treelord of Grin. * [[Stable Master Meltheniar>>StableMasterMeltheniar]] - The Griffon Lady. * [[Larn Kell-Turion>>LarnKellTurion]] - A spy for the Green Adept and possible pretender to the throne of Kinergh * [[Lord Andoth>>LordAndoth]] - The [[Green Adept>>GreenAdept]]'s chief lieutenant. Mightiest of the [[Air Knights>>AirKnights]] of Pazuzu. * [[Sir Glar Halath>>SirGlarHalath]] - Seneschal of the Air Knights. A fell opponent. * [[Half-Orc Grog>>HalfOrcGrog]] - A Half-Orc barbarian of questionable heritage living in [[Tisloch>>TownOfTisloch]] * [[Hag Dugh>>HagDugh]] - A powerful hag and enemy of the Fomorians. * [[Dudley Whitehelm>>DudleyWhitehelm]] - A paladin dedicated to Atur, but has he become corrupted? * [[Dwarf Gilladian>>DwarfGilladian]] - An old campaigner, now mostly retired. Good for some tall tales * [[Copper Dragon Xartialimax>>CopperDragonXartialimax]] - A wiley beast, makes his lair near [[High Hold>>HighHold]] and spins many webs. * [[Guillame Johannson>>GuillameJohannson]] - High Priest of Nomok in Bend. A follower of [[Barand of Fortunato>>BarandOfFortunato]] and minion of The [[Head Of Oboth Nai>>HeadOfObothNai]]. * [[Lars Johannson>>LarsJohannson]] - Baron of the Eastern March of Gilduin. Brother of Guillame Johannson and also associated with [[Barand of Fortunato>>BarandOfFortunato]] et al. * [[Elisha The Whip>>ElishaTheWhip]] - Elisha is the captain of the [[Hammer Maidens of Nomok>>HammerMaidenOfNomok]] in Bend and is another follower of [[BarandOfFortunato>>BarandOfFortunato]]. * RogueGoro - Goro is a famous rogue halfling who was recently living in Bend, until some adventurers got him kicked out of the area.
